items.sentence: I think that I might buy that house on Park Street that's for sale.
Do you think that there's any chance Tom knows Mary's phone number?
I still think it's unlikely we'll ever find someone to replace Tom.
Don't buy flowers for yourself. Let somebody else buy them for you.
Birds sometimes cause accidents by getting in the way of airplanes.
It's really sad when people exclude you because of your skin color.
This airport has up to three hundred takeoffs and landings per day.
I bought some gifts for my kids at the airport before driving home.
You didn't talk to me much back when we were in junior high school.
Tom lost money at the casino, but told his friends that he had won.
